Jan 5 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN TANZANIA

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN TANZANIA

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - GROSS CONSIDERATION FOR TRANSACTION WILL BE $176.1M.

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - AROUND $60M FROM PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE IN TANZANIA

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS WILL ALSO BE USED FOR DISTRIBUTION TO GOVERNMENT OF TANZANIA, AS PER SETTLEMENT DESCRIBED IN IPO PROSPECTUS DOCUMENT

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
